ðŸ“– Summary: Air-Guard is an ESP32-based Wi-Fi Intrusion Detection System that captures and analyzes wireless communication data in real-time. It provides a graphical interface for data visualization, detects various attacks like deauthentication and Evil Twin, and uses machine learning for advanced threat detection.
